title: Seven Years in Tibet
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
"Are you OK?
You've been shot in the head
And I'm holding your brains,"
The old woman said
So I drink in the shadows of an evening sky
See nothing at all
[Verse 2]
The stars look so special
And the snow looks so old
The frail form is drifting
Beyond the yoga zone
Time to question the mountain: Why pigs can fly?
It's nothing at all
[Chorus]
I praise to you
Nothing ever goes away
I praise to you
Nothing ever goes
I praise to you
[Chorus]
I praise to you
Nothing ever goes away
I praise to you
Nothing ever goes
I praise to you
Nothing ever goes away

[Outro]
I praise to you
Nothing ever goes, nothing ever goes
Nothing
